flavor_text: This Pokemon came to the defense of Pokemon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokemon is spoken of in legends.
Spoken of in legend this Pokemon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokemon.
